DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Gathering disease-related information medical chart patient primary head neck cancer undergone neck dissection complete response chemotherapy radiation therapy may help doctor learn disease find good method treatment . PURPOSE : This clinical trial evaluate medical chart patient primary head neck cancer undergone neck dissection complete response chemotherapy radiation therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Analysis Neck Dissection Following Complete Response Chemoradiation HNSCC
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Perform retrospective analysis , medical chart review , patient primary squamous cell carcinoma head neck underwent neck dissection follow complete response chemoradiotherapy . - Determine whether role post-chemoradiotherapy neck dissection affect outcome patient 's disease , term overall survival , disease-free survival , recurrence rate . OUTLINE : This pilot , retrospective study . Patients undergone neck dissection achieve complete clinical radiological response chemoradiotherapy compare patient . Data gather medical chart review .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis primary squamous cell carcinoma head neck follow site : Oral cavity Oropharynx Hypopharynx Larynx Complete response achieve treatment chemoradiotherapy Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
